Verses: 1 idho, Naan Aadharikkira En Dhaasan, Naan Therindhukondavarum, En Aaththumaavukkup Piriyamaanavarum Ivare; En Aaviyai Avarmel Amarappanninen; Avar Purajaadhigalukku Nyaayaththai Velippaduththuvaar.
2 avar Kookkuralidavumaattaar, Thammudaiya Saththaththai Uyarththavum Adhai Veedhiyile Ketkappannavumaattaar.
3 avar Nerindha Naanalai Muriyaamalum, Mangiyerigira Thiriyai Anaiyaamalum, Nyaayaththai Unmaiyaaga Velippaduththuvaar.
4 avar Nyaayaththai Boomiyile Nilaippaduththumattum Ilakkarippadhumillai, Padharuvadhumillai; Avarudaiya Vedhaththukkuth Theevugal Kaaththirukkum.

5 vaanangalai Sirushtiththu, Avaigalai Viriththu, Boomiyaiyum, Adhile Urpaththiyaagiravaigalaiyum Parappinavarum, Adhil Irukkira Janaththukkuk Suvaasaththaiyum, Adhil Nadamaadugiravargalukku Aaviyaiyum Kodukkiravarumaana Karththaraagiya Dhevan Sollugiradhaavadhu.
6 neer Kurudarudaiya Kangalaith Thirakkavum, Kattundavargalaik Kaavalilirundhum, Irulil Irukkiravargalaik Siraichchaalaiyilirundhum Viduvikkavum,
7 karththaraagiya Naan Needhiyinpadi Ummai Azhaiththu, Ummudaiya Kaiyaippidiththu, Ummaith Tharkaaththu, Ummai Janaththirku Udanpadikkaiyaagavum, Jaadhigalukku Oliyaagavum Vaikkiren.
8 naan Karththar, Idhu En Naamam; En Magimaiyai Veroruvanukkum, En Thudhiyai Vikkiragangalukkum Koden.
9 poorvakaalaththil Therivikkappattavaigal, Idho, Niraiveralaayina; Pudhiyavaigalaiyum Naane Arivikkiren; Avaigal Thondraadhadharku Munne, Avaigalai Ungalukku Sollugiren.

10 samuththiraththil Yaaththiraipannugiravargale, Adhilullavaigale, Theevugale Avaigalin Kudigale, Karththarukkup Pudhuppaattaip Paadungal; Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharaththilirundhu Avarudaiya Thudhiyaip Paadungal.

11 vanaandharamum, Adhin Oorgalum, Kedhaariyaa Kudiyirukkira Graamangalum Uraththa Saththamidakkadavadhu; Kanmalaigalile Kudiyirukkiravargal Gembeeriththu, Parvadhangalin Kodumudiyilirundhu Aarpparippaargalaaga.
12 karththarukku Magimaiyaichcheluththi, Avar Thudhiyaith Theevugalil Arivippaargalaaga.
13 karththar Paraakkiramasaaliyaippol Purappattu, Yuththaveeranaippol Vairaakkiyamoondu, Muzhangik Kerchchiththu, Thammudaiya Saththurukkalai Merkolluvaar.
14 naan Vegukaalam Mavunamaayirundhen; Summaayirundhu Enakkulle Adakkikkondirundhen; Ippozhudhu Pillai Perugiravalaippola Saththamittu, Avargalaip Paazhaakki Vizhunguven.
15 naan Malaigalaiyum Kundrugalaiyum Paazhaakki, Avaigalilulla Poondugalaiyellaam Vaadappanni, Aarugalaith Thittugalaakki, Erigalai Vatrippogappannuven.

16 kurudarai Avargal Ariyaadha Vazhiyile Nadaththi, Avargalukkuth Theriyaadha Paadhaigalil Avargalai Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu, Avargalukku Munbaaga Irulai Velichchamum, Konalai Sevvaiyumaakkuven; Indhak Kaariyangalai Naan Avargalukku Seydhu, Avargalaik Kaividaadhiruppen.
17 siththiravelaiyaana Vikkiragangalai Nambi, Vaarppikkappatta Suroobangalai Nokki: Neengal Engal Dhevargal Endru Sollugiravargal Pinnidaindhu Migavum Vetkappaduvaargal.
18 sevidare, Kelungal; Kurudare, Neengal Kaanumpadi Nokkip Paarungal.
19 en Dhaasanaiyallaamaal Kurudan Yaar? Naan Anuppiya Thoodhanaiyallaamal Sevidan Yaar? Uththamanaiyallaamal Kurudan Yaar? Karththarudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaiyallaamal Andhagan Yaar?
20 nee Anega Kaariyangalaik Kandum Gavaniyaadhirukkiraai; Avanukku Sevigalaith Thirandhaalum Kelaadhe Pogiraan.
21 karththar Thamadhu Needhiyinimiththam Avanmel Piriyam Vaiththirundhaar; Avar Vedhaththai Mukkiyappaduththi Adhai Magimaiyulladhaakkuvaar.

22 indha Janamo Kollaiyidappattum, Sooraiyaadappattum Irukkiraargal; Avargal Anaivarum Kebigalile Adappattu, Kaavalaraigalile Adaikkappattirukkiraargal, Thappuvippaar Illaamal Kollaiyaagi, Vittuvidu Enbaar Illaamal Sooraiyaavaargal.
23 ungalil Idharku Sevikoduththup Pinvarugiradhaik Gavaniththukketkiravan Yaar?

24 yaakkobai Siraiyittu Isravelaik Kollaikkaararukku Oppukkodukkiravar Yaar? Avargal Paavancheydhu Virodhiththa Karththar Allavo? Avarudaiya Vazhigalil Nadakka Manadhaayiraamalum, Avarudaiya Vedhaththukku Sevikodaamalum Ponaargale.

25 ivargalmel Avar Thamadhukobaththin Ukkiraththaiyum, Yuththaththin Valimaiyaiyum Varappanni, Avargalaichchoozha Akkinijuvaalaigalaik Koluththiyirundhum Unaraadhirundhaargal; Adhu Avargalaith Thagiththum, Adhaimanadhile Vaikkaadheponaargal.
